tests.description: llama-70b generated negative; focus on uniqueItems keyword

['minecraft:stone', 'minecraft:stone', 'minecraft:deepslate'] has non-unique elements

Failed validating 'uniqueItems' in schema[1]:

     'uniqueItems': True,

               'type': 'string',
               'minLength': 1}}

tests.description: llama-70b generated negative; focus on oneOf keyword
tests.rust_error: {"replace_with":"minecraft:stone"} is not valid under any of the schemas listed in the 'oneOf' keyword

{'replace_with': 'minecraft:stone'} is not valid under any of the given schemas

Failed validating 'oneOf' in schema['properties']['config']['properties']['replaceable']:
    {'description': 'Blocks can be carved for the current carver\n'
                    'https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Custom_carver#JSON_format',

               {'type': 'array',
                'uniqueItems': True,
                'items': {'description': 'A block can be carved for the '
                                         'current carver\n'
                                         'https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Custom_carver#JSON_format',
                          'type': 'string',
                          'minLength': 1}}]}

On instance['config']['replaceable']:
    {'replace_with': 'minecraft:stone'}
